title: How would the stability of the pontoon be affected if it were floated on a liquid with a greater density than water? - Quora

response.answer_text: The stability of a pontoon boat, a very stable platform to start out with, would only improve. The reason for this is that a denser liquid would support more weight shift on the pontoons with less change in draft.
what Paul Montgomery, wrote plus the ponton would ride a bit higher in the liquid (is this proper english? if not suggest a correction please)
